price: Ɛda no a asaase ne mmepͻ bεwoso nwoso kεseε no, mmepͻ no bεyε sε anwea a yaboa ano na εredwirie.
arabic: يَوۡمَ تَرۡجُفُ ٱلۡأَرۡضُ وَٱلۡجِبَالُ وَكَانَتِ ٱلۡجِبَالُ كَثِيبٗا مَّهِيلًا

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: yawma tarjufu al-arḍu wal-jibālu wakānati al-jibālu kathīban mahīlan
